mapper.insert: insert into site (name, types, contactor_name, contactor_phone, topic_id, drive_time, addr, description, pics, attach_files, province_id, city_id, county_id, fee) VALUES (#{name},#{types},#{contactorName},#{contactorPhone},#{topicId},#{driveTime},#{addr},#{description},#{pics},#{attachFiles},#{provinceId},#{cityId},#{countyId},#{fee})
mapper.update: update site set name=#{name}, types=#{types},contactor_name=#{contactorName},contactor_phone=#{contactorPhone}, topic_id=#{topicId}, drive_time=#{driveTime},addr=#{addr},description=#{description}, pics=#{pics},attach_files=#{attachFiles},province_id=#{provinceId}, city_id=#{cityId},county_id=#{countyId},fee=#{fee},updated_time=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from site where id in #{item}
mapper.select:
select s.id,s.name,s.types, s.contactor_name as contactorName, s.contactor_phone as contactorPhone, s.topic_id as topicId, t.name as topicName, s.drive_time as driveTime,s.addr, a.path, s.description,s.pics,s.attach_files as attachFiles, s.province_id as provinceId, s.city_id as cityId, s.county_id as countyId, s.updated_time as updatedTime,s.created_time as createdTime,s.fee from site s left join type t on t.id = s.topic_id left join address a on s.county_id = a.id where 1=1
and (s.name like '%${param}%' or t.name like '%${param}%')
and (s.types like '${typeId},%' or s.types like '%,${typeId}' or s.types like '%,${typeId},%' or s.types = #{typeId})
order by star,id desc
